updateDirectoryManager

public boolean updateDirectoryManager()
返回：
true if the current index accepting updates is changed. This method should be paired with clearRecentlyChanged() to clear the flag.
另请参见：

public List<org.apache.lucene.store.Directory> getAllArchivedDirectories()
返回：
a list that contains all the archived index directories excluding the one currently accepting updates.
